name: CIBOS
description:
CIBOS is a fun and dynamic "action platformer" video game.
It offers a solo adventure and multiplayer local and online mode, up to 4 players in competition with each others.
Collect, dodge and compare your score with players around the world !

You can already play at CIBOS by downloading our demo ( solo and multiplayer local only ).
Don't hesitate to give us feedback !

Cibos are little aliens who spend their lives at work. You are a Cibo ! You must collect a maximum of bolts in a waste reprocessing plant. The more bolts you have, the better your chances will be of becoming the best employee of the Galaxy !

Succeed your missions in a limited time, earn medals and progress in the hierarchy !

This game includes :
- Various powers for Cibo.
- An easy grip of the controls (keyboard, pad).
- Moving arenas during the game phases.
- A world scoreboard (you play against all players in the galaxy).
- An original universe, rich and varied.

CIBOS
Some references :
Super Smash Bros Brawl, Aladdin...
